DOC.brief_title: Study Paclitaxel , Carboplatin , Gemcitabine Versus Gemcitabine Vinorelbine Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Upon determination eligibility , patient randomly assign one two treatment arm : - Paclitaxel + Carboplatin + Gemcitabine - Gemcitabine + Vinorelbine For ever 2 patient treat , 1 receive treatment A ( Paclitaxel + Carboplatin + Gemcitabine ) 1 receive treatment B ( Gemcitabine + Vinorelbine ) . The study blind patient doctor know treatment assign .

No prior antineoplastic chemotherapy lung cancer prior study entry Age > 18 year Able perform activity daily live minimal assistance Adequate bone marrow , liver kidney function Written inform consent must obtain prior study entry Patients must available treatment followup . You participate study follow apply : Female patient pregnant lactate History heart disease Serious active infection time treatment Other serious underlie medical condition Brain metastasis Patients without measurable disease Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus define random blood sugar > 250mg/dL Dementia significantly alter mental status Significant peripheral neuropathy history physical examination .
